price: Yԑn (soro abͻfoͻ), yԑn mu biara wᴐ bea bi a yɛahyehyԑ ama no.
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
